A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I do not understand why people do not like this movie. There was only a few small moments were I thought it could have been better\, but I overall really enjoy the film. Any person that said they didn’t like it is probably some fan fiction writer who was upset the movie didn’t do what he expected it to do and anyone who said they are a huge Star Wars fan but won’t watch episode 9 because of this movie isn’t a real fan.
